articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Spotify responds to backlash over public podcast play counts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify rolled back an announcement that it would display play counts on podcast episodes; instead, counts will only appear after 50k plays.
articles.content: Spotify announced last week that it would roll out public play counts on all podcasts as a way of “helping attract new fans.” But podcasters swiftly responded with criticism of the new feature — main… [+2146 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Nintendo says more about how free Switch 2 updates will improve Switch games - Ars Technica
articles.description: “Improved image quality” and GameShare multiplayer for Mario, Zelda, and more.
